t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads

t: Amazon launches two furniture brands of its own - Curbed
s: November 7, 2017 - The company just launched two in-house furniture brands: Rivet, a midcentury modern line aimed at millennials (think smaller sofas with removable backs aimed at nomadic millennials in small urban apartments), and Stone & Beam, a country-modern brand targeting families at a higher price point.

t: Amazon is dropping dozens of in-house brands you didn’t even know it owned | The Verge
s: August 10, 2023 - Amazon is getting rid of dozens of in-house clothing brands as it faces a potential antitrust lawsuit from the FTC, according to a report from The Wall Street Journal.

t: 6 Companies Owned by Amazon
s: Aided by Amazon’s extensive delivery network, the company’s purchase of PillPack allows it to ship prescription medications overnight across the country. Like Whole Foods and Zappos, PillPack has retained its brand under Amazon’s ownership.
